DOC.brief_summary: Vitreous floater tiny , cloudy , clump cell appear otherwise clear fluid ( vitreous ) fill back 3/4 eye . Floaters commonly cause eye condition posterior vitreous detachment ( PVD ) , vitreous syneresis asteroid hyalosis . While symptom consider physiological nature , considerable inconvenience many patient affect essential activity . The investigator wish assess safety efficacy floater treatment patient highly symptomatic floater use FDA approve nanosecond infrared yttrium aluminum garnet ( YAG ) laser .
DOC.criteria: Have diagnose symptomatic floater last 2 month Willing proceed intervention Be able provide inform consent Diagnosed Posterior Vitreous Detachment Accept 1 % risk complication Less 19 year age Is high myope ( great 6 diopter ) Has monocular vision Diagnosed asteroid hyalosis Diagnosed acute onset floater ( less two month may clear spontaneously ) Has corneal lenticular opacity medium opacity may interfere treatment Has concomitant ocular disease pathology Has elevate intraocular pressure ( IOP ) IOP lower medication Has floater deem require five treatment session , surgical intervention best treatment course Has floater inaccessible current laser lenses Has floater locate less 2mm crystalline lens retina Found retinal tear retinal detachment initial examination history retinal detachment repair within last two year Has psychiatric problem may recur worsen Incapacity provide inform consent
